mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT productCode, productRecomm FROM product ORDER BY productRecomm DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT MIN(productId), productCode, productCategory, productBrand, productName, productPrice, productView FROM product GROUP BY productCode, productCategory, productBrand, productName, productPrice, productView ORDER BY productView DESC;

SELECT MIN(productId), productCode, productCategory, productBrand, productName, productPrice, productLike FROM product GROUP BY productCode, productCategory, productBrand, productName, productPrice, productLike ORDER BY productLike DESC;
SELECT * FROM productinquiry ORDER BY inqRef ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productinquiry (inqSubseq, inqWriter, inqTitle, inqContent, inqDate, productId, memId) VALUES ((SELECT inqSeq FROM productinquiry a ORDER BY inqSeq DESC LIMIT 1)+1, #{inqWriter}, #{inqTitle}, #{inqContent}, now(), #{productId}, #{memId})
INSERT INTO productinquiry (inqSubseq, inqWriter, inqTitle, inqContent, inqDate, productId, memId) VALUES (#{inqSubseq}, #{inqWriter}, #{inqTitle}, #{inqContent}, now(), #{productId}, #{memId})

INSERT INTO productinquiry (inqSubseq, inqRef, inqDepth, inqWriter, inqTitle, inqContent, inqDate, productId, memId, productCode) VALUES (#{inqSubseq}, (select ifnull(max(inqSeq), 0) + 1 from productinquiry b), #{inqDepth}, #{inqWriter}, #{inqTitle}, #{inqContent}, now(), #{productId}, #{memId}, #{productCode})

INSERT INTO productinquiry (inqSubseq, inqRef, inqDepth, inqWriter, inqTitle, inqContent, inqDate, productId, memId, productCode) VALUES (#{inqSubseq}, #{inqRef}, 1, #{inqWriter}, #{inqTitle}, #{inqContent}, now(), #{productId}, #{memId}, #{productCode})

INSERT INTO PRODUCT(productId, productCode, productCategory, productBrand, productName, productPrice, productColor, productSize, productDescription, productOrigFile, productNewFile, productStock, productSale, productRegiDate) SELECT concat('pid', LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(productId, 4)+1),3,0)), #{productCode}, #{productCategory}, #{productBrand}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productColor}, #{productSize}, #{productDescription}, #{productOrigFile}, #{productNewFile}, #{productStock}, #{productSale}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") FROM PRODUCT;
